Content.Text:
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I came to tell you what I found out.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So, I chatted with <MOJI0>, and
they think...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MOJI1>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>That's about all I could find out for now.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good luck! I've gotta get home, but come and
play with me again sometime!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, I talked to my sister, and she thinks...
